item.description:
Our Sunday Supper Series resumes just in time to allow SSDOMG members to try a noted local restaurant for significantly less than the usual cost of dining there. As noted in our Local Restaurant Deals discussion thread, Alba in Quincy center is continuing its three-course meal for $20.11 special through the first week of December.

People in the group have spoken well of Alba and it has been on Mike's To Try List for a long while, so he's pleased to have a chance both to try it himself and to share it during a Sunday Supper. Please come and join him.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Alba Restaurant
1486 Hancock St
Quincy, MA 02169

617 376-2522

Website: Alba Restaurant

Organizer: Mike

Guests: Yes. Two per member allowed. For questions about exceptions, please contact Mike.

Price Range: Alba is normally *not* known as an inexpensive restaurant but we're planning to check out the $20.11 dinner special mentioned above. You may of course order from their regular dinner menu.

Event Fee: Current Annual Members - None, Group Members - $2.00, Guests - $2.00;

2012 Annual Membership Special: Join as an Annual Member for 2012 before the end of 2011 and save! Through the end of this year, 2012 Annual Memberships are $6.00 for Current and Past Annual Members and $8.00 for all other Group Members.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over five years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

RSVP Deadline: Saturday, November 19th @ 3:00 pm. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by the Event Organizer. Changes to "No" after the deadline will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us Pages.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: Alba is located on Hancock Street, the main street that runs through Quincy Center.
item.how_to_find_us: Our reservation is under both 'Mike' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Sunday Supper Series: Alba
